sentences.sContent: But, paradoxically, as democracy gets stronger and the middle class grows richer, it can realize it has more to lose than gain from a real enfranchisement of society.
sentences.sContent_eng: But, paradoxically, as democracy gets stronger and the middle class grows richer, it can realize it has more to lose than gain from a real enfranchisement of society.
sentences.sCn: 但矛盾的是，民主发展了，资产阶级也富裕了，他们却意识到从一个真正解放的社会里能失去的越来越多，能获取的越来越少。

remMethod.val: 来自franchise(v. 解放； 给予权利)

words.tran: 给予选举权；给予自治权；解放，释放
